mechanical_performance.transmission: 8-speed automatic transmission with paddle shifters; available 6-speed intelligent Manual Transmission (iMT)
features: High-performance Michelin Pilot Super Sport summer tires (F: 255/35 ZR19; R: 275/35 ZR19)

exterior_features: 6-lens auto-leveling LED headlights (three low-beam; three high-beam)
Matte-black auto-folding, heated outside mirrors with memory function
interior_features: Smart Key System with Smart Entry and Start
14-way power-adjustable sport seats with driver’s-seat memory
connected_services_trials: Supra Connect capable (availability and features vary by package; 4G network dependent)
safety_convenience_features: Lane Departure Warning with Steering Assist (LDW w/SA)
Rearview camera with parking aid lines

contents: Full-Speed Dynamic Radar Cruise Control (DRCC) for automatic transmission models
Blind Spot Monitor (BSM) with Rear Cross-Traffic Alert (RCTA)
Parking sensors with emergency braking function
